definitions: (of a church or land) having been made or declared sacred

examples.text: a Christian burial in consecrated ground

shortDefinitions: (of church or land) having been made or declared sacred

definitions: (of bread and wine in Christian belief) declared to be or represent the body and blood of Christ

examples.text: they received the host but not the consecrated wine

shortDefinitions: (of bread and wine in Christian belief) declared to be or represent body and blood of Christ
